name: ui5-antares-pro
description: The UI5 Antares Pro library offers a comprehensive set of classes and methods that can significantly streamline the development of OData operations in SAPUI5 applications, reducing development time.

scripts.build: ui5 build preload --clean-dest --config ui5-npm.yaml --exclude-task=minify && node correct-types.js

author: Hasan Çiftçi (hasanciftcii26@gmail.com)
